definition: the palest ink is better than the best memory (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 ji4 xing4 bu4 ru2 lan4 bi3 tou2

definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
